context: <user>  My friend told me to go see this cool movie at imax. Your help setting that up for the 5th would be greatly appreciated. <system>  Sure. What's the name of the movie? <user>  It's called Wild Nights. <system>  And, what city do you want? <user>  Check out an imax in San Rafael, please. <system>  There is an 8: 30 pm showing at the Smith Rafael Film Center. <user>  Okay, and what's the genre of the movie? <system>
